DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate effect low dos pentavalent antimony ( meglumine antimoniate ) treat cutaneous leishmaniasis ulcer patient older 65 year . The hypothesis old patient may positive response lower dose pentavalent antimony , avoid frequent adverse event observed standard dose . The design open uncontrolled trial enrol 20 patient infected parasite Leishmania braziliensis endemic area State Bahia , Brazil . The endpoint cure therapeutic failure evaluate third month follow-up treatment avoid impact spontaneous cure confound factor .
DOC.brief_title: Low-dose Pentavalent Antimony Treatment Cutaneous Leishmaniasis Old Age Patients
DOC.criteria: Age > 65 year Permanent residence endemic area Availability caregiver dependent patient Mucosal disease cause leishmaniasis Disseminated cutaneous disease Severe cardiac , renal hepatic disorder Active cancer Active tuberculosis Leprosy HIV positive Total bilirubin > 1.5mg/dL Urea creatinin > 1.5 time upper normal level Alkaline phosphatase aminotransferases > 2.5 time upper normal level Lipase amylase > 1.5 upper normal level Hemoglobin < 5 g/dL
